ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: Is PUT with no entity allowed?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Brian, ... HTTP response codes. The design is, that a resource represents the right to do something. Why is this now allowed? best regards Stephan

Hi Brian,

 > Mapping "200 OK" = allow and "404 Not Found" = deny is an abuse of 
HTTP response codes.

The design is, that a resource represents the right to do something. Why 
is this now allowed?

best regards
  Stephan
